title: Industrial Mysore. Series 2
creator_credit: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and Jagat Murari
brief_description: A further report on Mysore and its products, including carvings in sandalwood and ivory, inlay work, sugar, paper from bamboo pulp, textiles and soap. Work in the Kojar goldfields is shown in some detail.
creator_credit_for_label: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and Jagat Murari
